title: Time for a new zyra skin

embed.description: Void Zyra~~ **Goth Zyra** http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/298/c/b/flower_of_darkness__zyra_in_league_of_legends_by_hanseul_kim-d5iwym8.jpg Or ~~Lotus Zyra~~ **Death Blossom Zyra** http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/099/d/4/zy_sp_fin_by_justduet-d7dtuwv.png Art was not made by me they care made by the people from DA which I can inform you their profile account if requested (:

body:
Ok so basically zyra is my main and the most recent skin for her was realised in 2014. She only has 3 altogether with one the Sktt1 skin being limited to get. 

Anyways I was looking through some boards and found a post (the link attached) which had a death blossom zyra and an arcade (Mariobros style) design and they look amazing! 

Zyra has so much potential to have such pretty and nice skins just like other champions for example lux and Sona. 

What do you guys think? Do you reckon it's time for riot to make some decent nice looking zyra skins, especially after her rework?

replies.body: Can we please get a new Zyra skin?
They could make arcade zyra with her plants like Mario deadly plants

Yes.. I waited for a skin for such a long time and there still isn't one :(
champs like ahri and annie have like 12342 skins..{{item:3070}}
We can't do anything... Just wait..
